text: Privacy Policy
Welcome to use BOSS direct employment products and services!

BOSS direct appointment products and services are Beijing Huapui Network Technology Co., Ltd. (registered address: 1801 in Building 1801, Building 1801, No.11801, Building 1801, No.16, Chaoyang District, Chaoyang District, Beijing).www.zhipin.com), BOSS direct appointment APP, related WeChat open platform account accounts or applets, and other new forms that may appear with technological development to provide you with products and services.
label: Contact Information

text: We attach great importance to your privacy protection and personal information protection, and specially formulate this "Privacy Policy" to help you understand the following:
I. Introduction

In order to effectively protect the privacy and personal information of BOSS direct employment and optimize the user experience, BOSS direct hires based on the "Personal Information Protection Law of the People's Republic of China", "The People's Republic of China Network Security Law", and the necessary personal information scope of mobile Internet applications for mobile Internet applications"And other laws and regulations, and refer to national standards such as the" Personal Information Security Standards for Information Security Technology "(GB/T 35273-2020), and formulate this" Privacy Policy ".
This "Privacy Policy" is suitable for all services we provide to you, whether you are directly hired by BOSS obtained through computer equipment, mobile terminals or other devices.

This "Privacy Policy" will specify the scope of personal information, collecting purposes, collection methods, and refusing to provide personal information that each function may be collected in detail.
Please know, if you refuse to provide information required for non -necessary personal information or additional functions, you can still use BOSS to directly hire basic functions.

This "Privacy Policy" will explain to you that the BOSS direct employment platform may need to be retrieved, the purpose of calling, or its corresponding business functions, whether to inquire before calling, and how to close the corresponding permissions, please know, you agree to this "After the Privacy Policy ", the corresponding equipment permissions will not be opened by default. When involving important or sensitive equipment permissions, when you use the corresponding business functions, we will open another pop -up window again.You can also turn off at any time through device settings. You do not agree to turn on permissions, which will not affect the normal use of other non -related business functions.
label: Policy Change
Important
Edit/Control
rewrite: You agree that after this "Privacy Policy", the corresponding equipment permissions will not be turned on by default. When important or sensitive equipment permissions are involved, when you use the corresponding business functions, we will be able to open up the pop -up window again after your consent will be opened again.Essence

text: We hope that you will read and understand all the contents of this "Privacy Policy" before using BOSS direct employment services. I hope you can make appropriate choices based on your own understanding.
In addition, when we use your personal information for the use of this "Privacy Policy", we will ask your consent in advance.
2. How do we collect and use your personal information
(1) Basic functions and related personal information
In the following services or functions provided by your direct hire by BOSS, we will collect your necessary personal information based on the following basic functions.
label: First Party Collection Information

text: 1. Account registration
You first need to register a BOSS direct account to become a registered user of BOSS direct hire.
When you register, you need to provide us with your own mobile phone number, and we will verify whether your identity is valid by sending a SMS verification code.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Usage
rewrite: When you register, you need to provide us with your mobile phone number.

text: If you do not provide this information, it will not affect your visit to the recruitment position through the tourist mode or log in to www.zhipin.com.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: If you do not provide this information, it will not affect your visit to the recruitment position through the tourist mode or log in to www.zhipin.com.

text: Note: Your mobile phone number will not be displayed to other users when you have no initiative or agreeing to exchange.
2. Improve the online resume

For job seekers, after your registration is successful, first of all, you need to improve the online resume (public), set your avatar, fill in your name, gender, job search identity, working hours, birth year, personal advantages, work experience (company companyName, industry, job time, position name, work content, skill label, work performance, affiliated department), project experience (project name, project role, project time, project description, project performance, project link), education experience (school school) (school school, Education, majors, school hours, school experience, graduation design/thesis title and description), qualification certificate, social homepage, volunteer service experience (project name, service time, project time, project description), job search expectations (Types of job hunting, expected cities, expectations, job preferences, salary requirements, expected industries), and job search status.

First Party Collection Information

text: We will match your positions that may be suitable for you according to your above information, and recommend you to possible recruiters.

text: 7. How do we deal with the personal information of minors
BOSS direct employment attaches great importance to the protection of minors' information.

Based on the nature of our products, websites and services, we will not deliberately collect or maintain personal information on our products and services from those under 16 years old, and any part of our products and services will not target people under 16 years old.Essence

text: 11. Applicable laws
This "Privacy Policy" and "BOSS Direct Appointment User Agreement" together constitute the basic agreement documents for you to use BOSS direct services.
This "Privacy Policy" is applicable to the current laws and regulations of the People's Republic of China.
Appendix: Definition
The specific words used in this "Privacy Policy" have the following meanings:
1. "We" or "BOSS Direct Appointment" refers to Beijing Huapui Network Technology Co., Ltd..

2. "Related Company" refers to other affiliates of Beijing Renju Renren Network Technology Co., Ltd., Beijing Huaye Cornerstone Network Technology Co., Ltd. and Beijing Huapui Network Technology Co., Ltd..
3. "You" or "user" refers to the registered users of the platform products or services operating using Beijing Huapui Network Technology Co., Ltd. and the buyer of charging services.
4. "BOSS Direct Hiring Platform" or "BOSS Direct Appointment Software" refers to www.zhipin.com, BOSS direct hire mobile clients, BOSS direct hire WeChat mini -programs.

5. "BOSS direct hiring affiliated platform" refersLimited to see the website, the store manager direct hire, BOSS direct hire flexible use of the flexible employment platform, BOSS face domination, etc. The previous chapter 4 (1) disclosure is subject to.

6. "Personal Information" refers to the various information that can be recorded alone or with other information to identify specific natural persons or reflects the activity of specific natural persons alone or with other information.

Personal information includes personal information, personal identity information, personal biometric information, network identity identification information, personal health and physiological information, personal education work information, personal property information, personal communication information, contact information, personal Internet records, personal commonly used devices for individualsInformation, personal location information, etc.
To avoid doubt, personal information includes but is not limited to personal sensitive information.
7. "The subject of personal information" refers to the natural person identified by the personal information.

8. "Personal sensitive information" refers to personal information that once leaked, illegally provided or abuses the security of people's body and property, and it is easy to lead to personal information such as personal reputation, physical and mental health damage or discriminatory treatment.
Personal sensitive information includes personal property information, personal health and physiological information, and personal biometric information.
9. "Location Information": refers to the authorized GPS location, WIFI information (SSID, BSSID, and network quality and status data).

10. "Delaid" refers to the process of processing the subject of personal information without using the technical processing of personal information to make it impossible to recognize the subject of personal information without using additional information.

11. "Anonymous" refers to the process that the personal information subject cannot be recognized by the technical processing of personal information, and the processing information after processing cannot be restored.
